author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Revolution Lighting Technologies Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $2.17
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Revolution Lighting Technologies Inc :
* REVOLUTION LIGHTING TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $165 MILLION TO $175 MILLION * Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.15
* SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $33 MILLION TO $35 MILLION * REVOLUTION LIGHTING TECHNOLOGIES - ‍EXPECT Q1 2018 GROSS PROFIT MARGIN OF 32% AND ADJUSTED EBITDA OF 3%​
* ‍EXPECTS FULL YEAR 2018 GROSS PROFIT MARGIN OF 32% - 33% AND ADJUSTED EBITDA IN 8% - 10% RANGE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
